EN:
A mission of the highest importance is within your reach.
The Redanian army requests your services.
For more information, a Redanian officer awaits you on the way to the Temple of Eternal Fire during the day.
Hey Witcher! Come here.
I need a help! Get over here.
Get out of my way.
I'm done with you.
Wait day time to encounter the redanian officer.
Follow redanian soldiers' footprints.
Investigate corpses.
Kill the elves.

Geralt found soldiers, their corpses were lying in the ravine near other bodies. Geralt has noticed that all of them had cyanotic skin and weirdly bent poses, probably died because of breathing failure. But what did cause this?
Check out the body of the white-haired witcher.
Geralt went into elven ambush, intoxicated with an unknown poison, he have lost any control over his body. The help came in an unexpected way - another witcher in heavy armor hurried to help Geralt.
Damn, they're dead.
Skin's unnaturally pale. No injuries. Hm...
Redanian soldier. Looks like he suffocated. Horrible way to die.
Redanian soldier. Body's strangely contortedâ€¦
Kill the bear in woods.
Bear prowled this area. But still, track's are clear. Lead into the woods.
They managed to avoid the bear, at least.
Ulvbjorn
Don't see any wounds, evidence of a fight.
Corpses look fresh. Curled out. Skin's unnaturally pale, but no blood loss.
Something happened, definitely, before they could attack.
Hmm, maybeâ€¦ They were poisoned? In what way?
*Sniff* *sniff* Hm, odd smell.
Scoiataelesâ€¦ What are they up to?
Akh akh ughâ€¦ Dammit, can't breathe.
What a catch, it's Vatt'ghern! And still breathing. Emilia will be happy to dissect his body.
I shall help this witcher.
Do you see any chance for my fellow comrade?
I don't know. We will have to see.
Find mitigating herbs near the hospital.
Find an antidote for the white-haired witcher.
Return the herbs to the medic.

Ahh! There you are. You're white-haired friend is stable, you'll be pleased to hear.
Indeed. Here are your herbs. Didn't expect that I had to run around the entire hospital, to be honest.
Please, master witcher, get the healing herbs.
It is done.
Your friend will need to get an antidote though, and sooner rather than later.
Let's wait until the gas dissipates completely.
What kinds of elves, even scoia'tels, experiment with bombs nowadays?
Hmmâ€¦ a letter with some instructions and a crystal. Will think about it later.
Another dh'oine. Kill him!
He is barely breathing. No any effect after white honey, but it will not help if it's a toxin.
Unusual poison, I have never seen like that. It smellsâ€¦ Some kind of mushrooms?
I can't do anything right now, need to get him to the hospital. It's in Novigrad.
Search elven bodies.
Instructions about experiment
A letter written in an elegant female hand

This time, check out the blue mushroom based bombs.
I need to know the average time to breathing arrest on healthy individuals. The corpse of the one that lasts the longest - bring it to me for autopsy. Here's a new crystal to activate the portal near the dead whale carcass as usual.

P.S. Just please no more dwarven corpses, I'm getting sick of their beards.

Mysterious Disappearance
In search of a job, Geralt decided to check the noticeboard in Novigrad.
Geralt found contract about disappeared squad of Redanians. The paper said that Redanian officer, who can provide more details, can be found on the bridge on Temple Isle.
After receiving all the required information, Geralt went to investigate the area where redanian soldiers have probably vanished.
